thread.title: Ground News - Weather update: Warning issued for severe thunderstorms, damaging winds and waves
thread.title_full: Ground News - Weather update: Warning issued for severe thunderstorms, damaging winds and waves

author: The Citizen
title: Ground News - Weather update: Warning issued for severe thunderstorms, damaging winds and waves
text:
Summary by The Citizen The Northern Cape and Western Cape can expect severe weather on Saturday that may lead to hail, flooding and disruption of municipal services. Weather warnings In its regional forecast, the SA Weather Service issued a yellow level 4 warning for severe thunderstorms with strong damaging winds, heavy downpours and possible large amount of small hail, resulting in localised structural damage to infrastructure or settlements (formal and informal), … Share menu 0 Articles 0 Articles All Left Center Right
The Citizen Lean Right High Factuality Media Conglomerate: Caxton and CTP Publishers and Printers Weather update: Warning issued for severe thunderstorms, damaging winds and waves The Northern Cape and Western Cape can expect severe weather on Saturday that may lead to hail, flooding and disruption of municipal services.
